Description: Up today we have a sweet Kramer Striker 200ST. These were made in the early to mid 80's to my knowledge. Features stock grover 18:1 tuners, 2 hot humbucking pickups and mini toggle switch to switch between pickups. 1 Vol & 1 tone knob. Great playing and sounding guitar, built extremely well! Get your hands on an original 80's Kramer today! For more info, please review the condition description and pics. Have any questions, feel free to ask! :) Please ask any and all questions, prior to purchasing. **Sold as is, no returns** item has been described accurately. No case or bag, but will be packaged extremely well for safe shipping. With proper shipping materials. Ships insured with tracking and signature confirmation. Please do not agree to buy if you do not plan to pay.
Title: Kramer Striker 200ST Early 80's Metallic Blue 6 String Eectric Guitar
ConditionDescription: In good used condition for a 30+ yr old guitar. Does have some minor scuff marks on the bottom near the input jack. There's also a blemish on the edge near the arm rest, and in the curse near the pickups. There's also some light scratches near the bridge, and some pick/play wear on the front near the pickups. There's also a blemish on the back of the neck near the first fret and on the back near the belly cut. Rest of the guitar is in good shape. Electronics tested and working. Neck is good and straight. Frets are in great condition as well. Great player!!!
